issue.title: Compiling drcsim against gazebo default branch produces very low real time factor

content.raw:
Profile data from `perf`, in both cases running `perf record gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so atlas_sandia_hands.world`, with a `roscore` running:

Top consumers as of eea487f28348:
~~~
 29.90%  gzserver  libgazebo_ode.so.1.8.2                  [.] 0x7dfd4
 10.46%  gzserver  [kernel.kallsyms]                       [k] 0xffffffff8103e0ca
~~~

Top consumers as of 251d77807aea:
~~~
 17.13%  gzserver  libgazebo_ode.so.1.8.2                  [.] 0x7dc8e
 15.77%  gzserver  libstdc++.so.6.0.16                     [.] std::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::basic_string(std::string const&)
 12.07%  gzserver  libstdc++.so.6.0.16                     [.] 0x9ebc8
  8.14%  gzserver  [kernel.kallsyms]                       [k] 0xffffffff8103e0ca
  5.39%  gzserver  libgazebo_physics.so.1.8.2              [.] gazebo::physics::Base::GetByName(std::string const&)
~~~

Looks like we introduced some profligate string handling.
content.html:
Profile data from perf, in both cases running perf record gzserver -s libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so atlas_sandia_hands.world, with a roscore running:

Top consumers as of eea487f28348:

 29.90%  gzserver  libgazebo_ode.so.1.8.2                  [.] 0x7dfd4
 10.46%  gzserver  [kernel.kallsyms]                       [k] 0xffffffff8103e0ca

Top consumers as of 251d77807aea:

 17.13%  gzserver  libgazebo_ode.so.1.8.2                  [.] 0x7dc8e
 15.77%  gzserver  libstdc++.so.6.0.16                     [.] std::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::basic_string(std::string const&)
 12.07%  gzserver  libstdc++.so.6.0.16                     [.] 0x9ebc8
  8.14%  gzserver  [kernel.kallsyms]                       [k] 0xffffffff8103e0ca
  5.39%  gzserver  libgazebo_physics.so.1.8.2              [.] gazebo::physics::Base::GetByName(std::string const&)

Looks like we introduced some profligate string handling.
